transArray.content:
Hygiene: very clean and comfortable environment
Facilities: There are robots delivering food, and the curtains are automatic, giving it a modern feel
Service: The attitude of the staff is also very good. I stayed one night next to the exam and even wrote blessings. They were very attentive.

Hello, my dear. You will be a positive person who reads gentle sentences and sees the sunshine. Your eyes are full of tenderness and smiles. May the stars in your eyes be overflowing with gentleness and be extremely gentle. I love you Hantingyo.
